Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Washington
ShortDescription: #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Madison, Western, Fulton and Damen due to street blockage near Damen/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Madison, Western, Fulton, then resume their normal route on Damen.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near Damen/Washington.

Headline: No Trains Between Damen-Milwaukee and Racine
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen-Milwaukee and Racine due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen-Milwaukee and Racine due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and Damen-Milwaukee, and,
  • between Forest Park and Racine, only.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Damen-Milwaukee and Racine to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
